name: width
label: Width
description: The width of the slider. ADD MORE WIDTH INFORMATION HERE

name: height
label: Height
description: Height of slider. ADD MORE HEIGHT INFORMATION HERE

name: circular
label: Circular (true/false)
description: Determines whether the slider should be circular

name: infinite
label: Infinite (true/false)
description: Determines whether the slider should be infinite. Note: It is possible to create a non-circular, infinite slider, but it is not possible to create a circular, non-infinite slider. (true or false)

name: responsive
label: Responsive (true/false)
description: Determines whether the slider should be responsive. If true, the items will be resized to fill the carousel.

name: direction
label: Direction (right/left/up/down)
description: The direction to scroll the carousel, determines whether the carousel scrolls horizontal or vertical and -when the carousel scrolls automatically- in what direction.

name: align
label: Align (center/left/right/false)
description: Whether and how to align the items inside a fixed width/height.

name: synchronise
label: Synchronise ADD MORE INFO
description: Selector for the slider to synchronise.

name: cookie
label: Cookie ADD MORE INFO
description: Determines whether the carousel should start at its last viewed position.

name: images
label: Images
description: List of images in the picture slider.
